# attributedText

**Instance Property**

An attributed variant of the primary text.

## Declaration

```swift
var attributedText: NSAttributedString? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Setting this property supersedes [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIContentUnavailableConfiguration-swift.struct/text] and some properties of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIContentUnavailableConfiguration-swift.struct/textProperties-swift.property].
